languages.text: Процедура реювинации вернула телу здоровье, но не в полном объеме — щупальца похитителя времени оставили свои шрамы.
The rejuvenation procedure may have restored the body's health, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's tentacles have left their scars.
languages.original_text: Процедура реювинации вернула телу здоровье, но не в полном объеме — щупальца похитителя времени оставили свои шрамы.

traits.locale_text: The rejuvenation procedure restored the body's health, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's clutches have left their scars.
The rejuvenation procedure restored the body's health, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's clutches have left their scars.
The rejuvenation procedure restored the body, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's tentacles have left their scars.
The rejuvenation procedure restored the body, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's tentacles have left their scars.
The rejuvenation procedure may have restored the body's health, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's tentacles have left their scars.
The rejuvenation procedure may have restored the body's health, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's tentacles have left their scars.

languages.text: 尽管复原过程恢复了身体的机能，但仅仅是在一定程度上缓和了伤痛。时光窃取者的触手已经留下了伤痕。
languages.original_text: The rejuvenation procedure may have restored the body's health, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's tentacles have left their scars.

traits.locale_text: 尽管复原过程恢复了身体留下的伤口，但仅仅是在一定程度上缓和了伤痛。时间窃取者的触手已经留下了伤痕。

languages.text: 回復処置によって身体の健康は回復したが、限度があった。時を奪う者の触手が刻んだ傷跡は、今もなお残っている。
languages.original_text: The rejuvenation procedure may have restored the body's health, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's tentacles have left their scars.

traits.locale_text: 回復処置によって身体の健康は回復したが、限度があった。時を奪う者の触手が刻んだ傷跡は、今もなお残っている。

languages.text: El proceso de rejuvenecimiento ha restaurado la salud del cuerpo, pero solo hasta cierto punto. Los tentáculos del ladrón de tiempo han dejado cicatrices.
languages.original_text: The rejuvenation procedure may have restored the body's health, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's tentacles have left their scars.

traits.locale_text: El proceso de rejuvenecimiento ha restaurado el cuerpo, pero solo hasta cierto punto. Los tentáculos del ladrón de tiempo han dejado cicatrices.

languages.text: Die Verjüngungsprozedur mag den Körper wiederhergestellt haben, allerdings nur bis zu einem gewissen Maß. Die Tentakel des Zeiträubers haben ihre Narben hinterlassen.
languages.original_text: The rejuvenation procedure may have restored the body's health, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's tentacles have left their scars.

traits.locale_text: Die Verjüngungsprozedur hat den Körper wiederhergestellt, allerdings nur bis zu einem gewissen Maß. Die Tentakel des Zeiträubers haben ihre Narben hinterlassen.

languages.text: La procédure de rajeunissement a régénéré le corps, mais seulement jusqu'à un certain point. Les tentacules du voleur de temps ont laissé leur marque.
languages.original_text: The rejuvenation procedure may have restored the body's health, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's tentacles have left their scars.

traits.locale_text: La procédure de rajeunissement a régénéré le corps, mais seulement jusqu'à un certain point. Les tentacules du voleur de temps ont laissé leur marque.

languages.text: İyileştirme prosedürü, beden sağlığını bir yere kadar toparlayabilir. Zaman hırsızının dokunaçlarından kalan iz geçmeyecektir.
languages.original_text: The rejuvenation procedure may have restored the body's health, but only to a degree. The time-stealer's tentacles have left their scars.

traits.locale_text: İyileştirme prosedürü, beden sağlığını bir yere kadar toparlayabilir. Zaman Hırsızı'nın dokunaçlarından kalan iz geçmeyecektir.
